mapper.select: SELECT ma2.article_id, ma2.article_name, pi1.barcode, pi1.sales_unit_id AS uom, pi1.bad_qty FROM pi0120 pi1, ma1100 ma2 WHERE pi1.pi_cd = #{piCd} AND pi1.pi_date = #{piDate} AND pi1.store_cd = #{storeCd} AND pi1.bad_qty IS NOT NULL AND ma2.article_id = pi1.article_id AND #{businessDate} BETWEEN ma2.effective_start_date AND ma2.effective_end_date

SELECT pi2.pi_cd, pi2.pi_date, pi2.store_cd FROM pi0100 pi1 LEFT JOIN pi0100 pi2 ON pi1.store_cd = pi2.store_cd AND pi2.pi_status = '03' AND concat(pi1.pi_date,pi1.pi_start_time) >= concat(pi2.pi_date,pi2.pi_start_time) WHERE pi1.store_cd = #{storeCd} AND pi1.pi_cd = #{piCd} AND pi1.pi_date = #{piDate} /*AND pi1.pi_status = '03'*/ ORDER BY concat(pi2.pi_date,pi2.pi_start_time) ASC LIMIT 7

SELECT pi1.pi_cd, pi1.pi_date, pi1.store_cd, ma4.pma_cd, ma5.pma_name, sum(pi2.variance_qty*ma6.base_sale_price) AS varianceAmt FROM pi0120 pi1, pi0125 pi2, ma1000 ma2, cm9060 cm3, ma1100 ma4, ma0080 ma5, ma1130 ma6 WHERE pi1.store_cd = #{storeCd} AND pi1.pi_cd = #{piCd} AND pi1.pi_date = #{piDate} AND pi2.pi_cd = pi1.pi_cd AND pi2.pi_date = pi1.pi_date AND pi2.store_cd = pi1.store_cd AND pi2.article_id = pi1.article_id AND ma2.store_cd = #{storeCd} AND cm3.sp_id = '0000' AND cm3.sp_value BETWEEN ma2.effective_start_date AND ma2.effective_end_date AND ma4.article_id = pi1.article_id AND cm3.sp_value BETWEEN ma4.effective_start_date AND ma4.effective_end_date AND ma5.pma_cd = ma4.pma_cd AND ma6.article_id = pi2.article_id AND ma6.structure_cd = ma2.zo_cd GROUP BY pi1.pi_cd, pi1.pi_date, pi1.store_cd, ma4.pma_cd, ma5.pma_name

SELECT pi1.pi_cd, pi1.pi_date, pi1.store_cd, ma2.category_cd, ma5.category_name, COUNT(pi1.article_id) AS sku, SUM(pi1.real_time_qty) AS inventoryQty, SUM(ma3.base_sale_price) AS base_sale_price, SUM ( pi1.variance_qty ) AS variance_qty, SUM ( pi1.variance_qty * ma3.base_sale_price ) AS variance_amt FROM pi0125 pi1, pi0120 pi2, ma1100 ma2, ma1130 ma3, ma1000 ma4, ma0090 ma5 WHERE pi1.pi_cd = #{piCd} AND pi1.pi_date = #{piDate} AND pi1.store_cd = #{storeCd} AND pi2.pi_cd = #{piCd} AND pi2.pi_date = #{piDate} AND pi2.store_cd = #{storeCd} AND pi1.article_id = pi2.article_id AND ma2.article_id = pi1.article_id AND #{businessDate} BETWEEN ma2.effective_start_date AND ma2.effective_end_date AND ma5.category_cd = ma2.category_cd AND ma4.store_cd = #{storeCd} AND #{businessDate} BETWEEN ma4.effective_start_date AND ma4.effective_end_date AND ma3.article_id = ma2.article_id AND #{businessDate} BETWEEN ma3.effective_start_date AND ma3.effective_end_date AND ma3.structure_cd = ma4.zo_cd
AND 0 > pi1.variance_qty
AND pi1.variance_qty > 0
GROUP BY pi1.pi_cd, pi1.pi_date, pi1.store_cd, ma2.category_cd, ma5.category_name

SELECT ma3.store_cd AS storeCd, ma3.store_name AS storeName, SUM(pi2.real_time_qty) AS inventoryQty, SUM(pi2.pi_qty) AS piQty, SUM(ma4.base_sale_price) AS baseSalePrice, SUM(pi2.variance_qty) AS varianceQty, SUM(pi2.variance_qty*ma4.base_sale_price) AS varianceAmt, SUM(pi1.bad_qty) AS badQty FROM pi0120 pi1, pi0125 pi2, ma1000 ma3, ma1130 ma4, cm9060 cm5 WHERE pi1.pi_cd = #{piCd} AND pi1.pi_date = #{piDate} AND pi1.store_cd = #{storeCd} AND pi2.pi_cd = pi1.pi_cd AND pi2.pi_date = pi1.pi_date AND pi2.store_cd = pi1.store_cd AND pi2.article_id = pi1.article_id AND ma3.store_cd = #{storeCd} AND cm5.sp_id = '0000' AND cm5.sp_value BETWEEN ma3.effective_start_date AND ma3.effective_end_date AND ma4.article_id = pi1.article_id AND ma4.structure_cd = ma3.zo_cd GROUP BY ma3.store_cd, ma3.store_name

SELECT pi1.article_id AS articleId, ma2.article_name AS articleName, ma2.category_cd AS categoryCd, ma3.category_name AS categoryName, ma4.material_type_name AS materialName, ma2.sales_unit_id AS uom, pi1.real_time_qty AS inventoryQty, pi1.pi_qty AS piQty, ma7.base_sale_price AS baseSalePrice, pi5.bad_qty AS badQty, (pi1.pi_qty-pi1.real_time_qty) AS varianceQty, (ma7.base_sale_price*(pi1.pi_qty-pi1.real_time_qty)) AS varianceAmt FROM pi0125 pi1, ma1100 ma2, ma0090 ma3, ma4140 ma4, pi0120 pi5, ma1000 ma6, ma1130 ma7, cm9060 cm8 WHERE pi1.pi_cd = #{piCd} AND pi1.pi_date = #{piDate} AND pi1.store_cd = #{storeCd} AND pi5.pi_cd = pi1.pi_cd AND pi5.pi_date = pi1.pi_date AND pi5.store_cd = pi1.store_cd AND pi5.article_id = pi1.article_id AND ma2.article_id = pi1.article_id /* 不盘点原材料商品 */ AND ma2.material_type != '04' and ma2.article_id not in (select article_id from pi0126) AND ma6.store_cd = #{storeCd} AND cm8.sp_id = '0000' AND cm8.sp_value BETWEEN ma6.effective_start_date AND ma6.effective_end_date AND cm8.sp_value BETWEEN ma2.effective_start_date AND ma2.effective_end_date AND ma7.structure_cd = ma6.zo_cd AND ma2.category_cd = ma3.category_cd AND ma2.material_type = ma4.material_type_id AND ma7.article_id = pi5.article_id

SELECT sum(sa1.sale_amount) FROM sa0020 sa1 WHERE sa1.store_cd = #{param.storeCd} AND sa1.detail_type = 's' AND to_char(sa1.sale_date,'yyyyMMddhh24miss') BETWEEN concat(#{param.lastStocktakeDate},#{param.lastEndTime}) AND concat(#{param.thisStocktakeDate},#{param.thisStartTime})

SELECT sum(sa1.sale_amount) FROM sa0020 sa1 WHERE sa1.store_cd = #{storeCd} AND sa1.detail_type = 's' AND to_char(sa1.sale_date,'yyyyMMddhh24miss')
BETWEEN concat(#{piDate},#{startTime}) AND concat(#{piDate},#{endTime})

SELECT pi1.pi_cd AS thisStocktakeCd, /*本次盘点cd*/ pi1.store_cd, ma2.store_name, ma2.open_date, ma2.effective_start_date, pi1.pi_date AS thisStocktakeDate, /*本次盘点日期*/ pi1.pi_start_time AS thisStartTime, /*本次开始时间*/ pi1.pi_end_time AS thisEndTime, /*本次结束时间*/ pi2.pi_date AS lastStocktakeDate, /*上次盘点日期*/ pi2.pi_cd AS lastStocktakeCd, /*上次盘点cd*/ pi2.pi_start_time AS lastStartTime, /*上次盘点开始时间*/ pi2.pi_end_time AS lastEndTime, /*上次盘点结束时间*/ date_part('day', cast(pi1.pi_date AS TIMESTAMP)- cast(pi2.pi_date AS TIMESTAMP)) AS day /*距离上次盘点相差的天数*/ FROM pi0100 pi1 LEFT JOIN pi0100 pi2 ON pi1.store_cd = pi2.store_cd AND pi2.pi_status = '03' AND concat(pi1.pi_date,pi1.pi_start_time) > concat(pi2.pi_date,pi2.pi_start_time), ma1000 ma2, cm9060 cm3 WHERE pi1.store_cd = #{storeCd} AND pi1.pi_cd = #{piCd} AND pi1.pi_date = #{piDate} /*AND pi1.pi_status = '03'*/ AND ma2.store_cd = #{storeCd} AND cm3.sp_id = '0000' AND cm3.sp_value BETWEEN ma2.effective_start_date AND ma2.effective_end_date ORDER BY concat(pi2.pi_date,pi2.pi_start_time) DESC limit 1

SELECT pi1.article_id, pi1.article_name, pi1.barcode, pi1.sales_unit_id AS uom, pi1.first_qty, pi1.region FROM pi0120_t pi1 WHERE pi1.pi_cd = #{piCd} AND pi1.pi_date = #{piDate} AND pi1.store_cd = #{storeCd}
